headline.main: Kirkuk Oil Flows in Jeopardy Again as Kurdish Tensions Grow
headline.print_headline: Kirkuk Oil Flows in Jeopardy Again as Kurdish Tensions Grow

lead_paragraph: European Union states will take the formal decision on Monday to create a joint command center for the bloc's military missions, a symbolic step in the renewed quest for more security and defense cooperation, officials and diplomats in Brussels said.
